name: Attack of the Macrabron! A satirical Yellow Jackets mini-RTS !
name_original: Attack of the Macrabron! A satirical Yellow Jackets mini-RTS !
description:
# WHAT THE FAK IS DIS THING?
You have to handle stupid overworking units and your goal is to defeat the cruel Macrabron.

But is it really the right choice? Try to avenge your people and see what happens!

Made with Frenglish love and livecoded at https://twitch.tv/vikfro with Godot Engine for the Godot Wild Jam 23, which theme was "TINY WORLD". Expansion of  "Macaron Simulator", my submission last week for GMTK 2020, which theme was  "Out of Control".


# HOW TO PLAY:

- left click to select a unit. You can select only one at a time. Rest of the time, they have an overworking mindset and they lose their morale. Which makes them go on strike and turn them into Yellow Jackets! Because GMTK jam was "out of control" :D

- right click to give an order to the selected unit. You can either

1. order to move anywhere

2. with a blue shirt worker you can print moneeeey! When you get to 40$, you spawn a new worker automatically.

3. with a yellow jacket rebel, you can attack Macrabron!

# THANKS
- My growing community & other indie creators I met through streaming at https://twitch.tv/vikfro
- ...The cliché  "You" for reading / playing / rating / commenting / whatevering!
